Class UserMeasurementShowAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<UserMeasurementShowAdapter.MyViewHolder>
com.example.cardiocare.UserMeasurementShowAdapter
public class UserMeasurementShowAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<UserMeasurementShowAdapter.MyViewHolder>
A RecyclerView adapter that displays a list of UserMeasurementDetails objects.
